mapper.select: SELECT EMAIL as username, EMAIL as email, PASSWD as password, 'ROLE_ADMIN' AS authority, '1' as enabled FROM EMPLOYEE WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
SELECT EMAIL as email, NAME as name, LEVEL as level, PHONE as phone, PASSWD as passwd, REGTIME as regtime FROM EMPLOYEE ORDER BY LEVEL ASC, NAME ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EMPLOYEE ( EMAIL, NAME, LEVEL, PHONE, PASSWD, REGTIME ) VALUES ( #{email}, #{name}, 3, #{phone}, #{passwd}, NOW() )
